boardgame.name: Pokój 25
Room 25
boardgame.description: Trapped in a prison in which each room has four doors but apparently no exit, the players must try to find Room 25, the supposed exit to this nightmare. But some amongst them might be guardians of the prison, waiting for the right moment to strike. In the cooperative game Room 25, not everyone wants to escape from imprisonment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but who is the traitor? Each turn, the player moves are preprogrammed, requiring discussion, negotiation _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and possibly betrayal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Room 25 includes five different playing modes, from full cooperation to a solitaire game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 015 – Top 10 Mechanisms
Episode 83- Salem and Daedalus Productions Contest

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: FR/EN/NL
FR/EN/NL

ASMODEE (ASMROOM01) In this futurist reality TV show you are gambling with your life, trapped in a prison composed of 25 rooms with unexpected effects! Cooperate with each other to find the exit: Room 25. But be careful, a guard might be hiding among you, the prisoners, and he won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to use whatever force necessary to keep you from escaping! Choose the difficulty of the game and have more fun with the different prison compositions, thanks to the various game modes: Cooperation, Suspicion, Competition and Solo.

Kaissa Multilingual third edition English, French, Greek, Spanish (German rules available online) Alle Spiele stammen aus einem tierfreien Nichtraucherhaushalt. All games are from a smoke and pet free home. Zahlung: Bezahlung per Überweisung oder bei Abholung im Raum Saarbrücken. Die Versandkosten betragen 5,99 Euro Beim Kauf mehrere Artikel vom Marketplace wird der günstigste Versand für die gekauften Artikel ermittelt. Der Versand erfolgt immer versichert und mit Sendungsverfolgung. Bei Unklarheiten oder Fragen bitte vor dem Kauf mit mir Kontakt aufnehmen. Es handelt sich um einen Privatverkauf. Der Verkaufsgegenstand wird unter Ausschluss jeglicher Gewährleistung verkauft. Der Ausschluss gilt nicht für Schadensersatzansprüche aus grob fahrlässiger bzw. vorsätzlicher Verletzung von Pflichten des Verkäufers sowie für jede Verletzung von Leben, Körper und Gesundheit. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Pick up the game(s) at my home. (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. If something is not clear or if you have any questions please contact me befor you buy a game. Thanks for looking, keep gaming.
This entry is ONLY for brandonheyman for the winning bid in my auction. The buyer is responsible for shipping.
Played once in great condition $10.00 + shipping I will combine shipping with any other of my sales.

Punched but not played, all components complete. Four of the six figurines were broken on arrival, but Matagot replaced them with a completely new set of six. The extra unbroken scientist and little girl figures are included with the new full set, along with a small plastic box to store the figures and prevent any more damage. The punchboards arrived slightly scuffed and a few of the cardboard tokens are not pristine - not bad enough to affect gameplay but should be mentioned. Otherwise, this has been carefully stored in the living area of a non-smoking home: no smoke or basement odors. Thanks for looking!
